name: MEDtube
tag_list: medical-videos, surgical-videos, md, surgeons, doctors, medical-knowledge
overview:
MEDtube.net is video-sharing platform for healthcare professionals worldwide, focused on education. It is the largest collection of professional medical videos on the Internet (over 10.000 peer-reviewed videos across all medical specialties), free of charge. MEDtube strives for innovation in healthcare and supports efficient medical education and implementation of new medical technologies.

MEDtube team of doctors curates all the content and provides medical expertise. It consist of MDs, PhDs, tech and marketing professionals.

The project was launched by two surgeons in 2009 and brought online in July 2011.

MEDtube is delivering high quality content categorized by all medical specialties.

Its business model is based on commercial projects with partners (medical devices manufacturers, pharmaceutical companies, hospitals, educational institutions) as well as on video production / live broadcast events.

MEDtube is supported by many healthcare professionals (“Who supports us”, “Board of Advisers”).
